review: The main reasons i bought this unit over the Fire Stick was the parental controls and voice search.  I was disappointed as the parental controls are geared for small children all i wanted was to be able to set on and off times for my teenagers.  If you use the parental controls you can't do that you have to restrict content including prime and for more advanced features there is a monthly fee.  The second reason was the voice search but what it does not tell you is the voice search is limited to Amazon Products, no Netflix, Hulu Etc.  Overall it is a good product but i could have gotten the same results with a Fire Stick for less money.  I hope they read the review and make upgrades.
